name: Furious Chase (William FILIPE)
description:
Furious Chase is a project realized in 3 days by 6 students of the IIM. For this project we had to make a remake of space invaders by incorporating a maximum of feedback to make it as "juicy" as possible.

You play as a bank robber trying to escape on his golf cart, shooting at waves of police cars to survive as long as possible.

Game/Level Design : Amir ALOTOUNOU

                                     William FILIPE

Game Art : Abdelbari BERRIM  https://www.artstation.com/berrim

                    Théo BALICOUR    https://www.artstation.com/theo_balicour
